This app is made by Knut Johan Hesten, Long Hyunh, Hakon Stensheim and Lasse Tangeras as part of the spring 2016 Android course at HSN.
It\'s main usage is to save and rate snus you encounter in the wild. If you like a snus you can rate it, and share your list with other people too!
We hope you enjoy our app, but please be aware that Snus is highly addictive and might damage your health!
